headline: Does Realty Income Offer Value After Recent Fed Rate Pause and 14% Year-to-Date Gain?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Realty Income stock? You’re not alone. The last year has been something of a roller coaster for this well-known REIT, but there’s plenty to keep both value-seekers and cautious investors engaged. Over the past week, Realty Income has ticked up 0.5%, while its 30-day gain sits at 4.1%. The year-to-date return has reached 14.2%, hinting at a shift in sentiment around this “monthly dividend company,” even if the 1-year return is a more modest 1.8%. Longer-term...
